item.title: Suspect in 2012 Benghazi attack arrested, DOJ says
item.description: A suspect in the 2012 terrorist attack on the U.S. embassy in Benghazi has been arrested and brought back to the United States.

item.title: Consumer sentiment brightens, defying economists' expectations
item.description: Shopper attitudes remain below where they registered a year ago, data showed.
